entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 19 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 19 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
